# Terms and Conditions & Privacy Policy

## 1. Introduction
This prototype application has been developed as part of an academic project at **Northumbria University**.  
The app is designed for **care providers only** and is not intended for public or commercial use.  
No real personal, health, or patient data should be entered or stored in this prototype.

By using this app, you agree to these Terms and acknowledge this Privacy Policy.

---

## 2. Purpose and Acceptable Use
- This app is intended solely for **demonstration and educational purposes**.  
- Users must not upload or process any **real patient or confidential data**.  
- All test data should be **fictional or anonymised**.  
- The development team and university accept no responsibility for any misuse or data entered by users.

---

## 3. Data Handling and Privacy (GDPR Compliance)
This application follows the principles of the **UK General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR)**.  
While the prototype does not collect or share real user data, the following safeguards are in place:

- Any stored data (e.g., login credentials) is **hashed and anonymised** before being saved locally.  
- No data is shared with third parties or external servers.  
- The app does not access or store personal identifiers, GPS, media, or contact information.

If future versions of the app handle personal data, users will be clearly informed and required to provide consent before any data processing occurs.

---

## 4. User Consent
By ticking the **“I accept the Terms and Privacy Policy”** checkbox during login or registration, you consent to:
- The use of test data within the prototype for demonstration purposes only.  
- The application of secure storage and hashing methods for any locally stored credentials.  
- The acknowledgment that this is a non-commercial, educational system.

---

## 5. Data Security
The development team has applied standard security practices, including:
- **Password hashing** using SHA-256 encryption.  
- **Secure file management** to prevent accidental exposure of sensitive data.  
- **Version control safety** via `.gitignore` to exclude configuration and secret files.

Despite these precautions, users are reminded that this is a **prototype** and should not be used for production purposes.

---

## 6. User Rights
Under GDPR, users have the right to:
- Request access to or deletion of any test data they entered.  
- Withdraw consent to participate in prototype testing.  

Such requests can be made directly to the **project supervisor** or **team** through university communication channels.

---

## 7. Liability Disclaimer
This prototype is provided “as is” without any guarantees of performance, availability, or security.  
The project team and Northumbria University accept no liability for data loss, misuse, or errors resulting from its use.

---

## 8. Contact
For questions or feedback regarding the app or its data-handling procedures, please contact the **project development team** or your **module supervisor** through the university’s communication channels.
